title: [CLIENT] I am owner of a club and still can’t see it
body:
My club is still active and my club member sees me and I am still the leader of the club.

I have tried to restart my server many times but I still don’t see it.

replies.body: Exact same thing is happening with me. I owned a club before the whole club thing had issues I guess and it was disabled. It says i have joined 0/3 Clubs however, my friends in my club say Im still in it but it says Im offline. When they hover over my name in the club chat, the little circle is grey but says "Online", "In-game", etc. Strange, but I'd like an answer too lol

We'd like to look into this with you and help if we can!  There's been some issues with clubs since it was [re-enabled](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see!
